question:
Which among the following matches of maximum ages of Civil service with their corresponding years is/ are correct?
1. 1860- 22
2. 1866- 21
3. 1878- 19
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: The maximum age of the Civil Service in London was 22 in the year 1860. In the year 1866, it was lowered to 21 and in the year 1878, it was lowered to 19.
